mapper.select: SELECT a.activity_title as 'activityTitle',m.picture,m.activity_num as 'activityNum' from tb_activity_apply a LEFT JOIN tb_activity_manage m on m.activity_id=a.activity_id where a.user_id=#{0}
select *from tb_activity_apply where activity_id=#{activityId} and user_id=#{userId}
mapper.sql: apply_id, activity_id, user_id, apply_name, apply_phone, activity_title, valid_date, department, area, province, city, area1, remark, create_date, create_by, last_updated_by, last_update_date, record_version, deleted_flag, deleted_by, deletion_date
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tb_activity_apply
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_activity_apply (apply_id, activity_id, user_id, apply_name, apply_phone, activity_title, valid_date, department, area, province, city, area1, remark, create_date, create_by, last_updated_by, last_update_date, record_version, deleted_flag, deleted_by, deletion_date ) values (#{applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{recordVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deletedFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deletedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deletionDate,jdbcType=DATE} )
